data.description: Functions to automate use of PeopleSoft
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
No PeopleSoft modules have ever been supplied. My plan is to use
    the root module for documentation of all the modules and functions
    that are applicable to all of PeopleSoft. I'll also be providing the
    following:

    PeopleSoft::Tools PeopleSoft::EPM
